text.footprintparticle.option.title: Footprint Particle
text.footprintparticle.option.applyBlock:
Blocks that footprint will appear.
Format: §9§omodid:blockid§r or §9§o#modid:blocktag§r
Use only when built-in hardness-based filter
cannot suit your requirements.
text.footprintparticle.option.excludedBl:
Blocks that footprint will NOT appear.
Format: §9§omodid:blockid§r or §9§o#modid:blocktag§r
Lower priority than applied.
text.footprintparticle.option.excludedMo:
Mobs in this list will not generate footprint.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid§r
text.footprintparticle.option.sizePerMob:
Set a separate size for a mob.
Format: §9§omodid:mobid,size§r
Default is 0.5 for most mob.
Lower priority than excluded.
text.footprintparticle.option.horseLikeM:
Mobs in this list will gen footprint both front and rear.
They'll chenged frequency when is mounted or dismounted.
text.footprintparticle.option.spiderLike:
Mobs in this list will gen footprint both left and right.
They'll have more frequent to gen (fit its eight legs).
